Name: Madurised Old Fashioned Godfather
Ingredients: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: As the name suggests this is an almond flavoured Old-Fashioned with medium dry madeira adding wine notes while three different whiskies also add to the drink's balance and complexity.
History: Created in June 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. See: Old-Fashioned cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Madurised Old Fashioned Godfather contains 180 calories
